identity.name: OmniHub
identity.mission: To provide a centralized, high-efficiency toolkit for digital power users, wrapped in a sleek, futuristic interface.
identity.tone: Functional, Powerful, Cyber-Tech, Efficient, 'Black Mirror' but usable.
identity.aesthetic: Dark Mode First, Electric Accents, Glassmorphism, High Contrast.

marketing.name: Tetris Grid
marketing.rules: Asymmetry is key. Use col-span-8 for hero, col-span-4 for supporting content.

dashboard.name: Control Room Grid
dashboard.rules: Dense packing. Use col-span-2 row-span-2 for main charts. No jagged bottoms.

buttons.primary: bg-primary text-primary-foreground hover:bg-primary/90 shadow-[0_0_20px_rgba(99,102,241,0.5)] transition-all duration-300 rounded-md px-8 py-3 font-bold tracking-wide
buttons.secondary: bg-secondary text-secondary-foreground hover:bg-secondary/90 rounded-md px-6 py-2 font-medium

cards.default: bg-card border border-border/50 rounded-xl shadow-xl overflow-hidden hover:border-primary/50 transition-colors duration-300
cards.glass: bg-black/40 backdrop-blur-md border border-white/10 rounded-xl shadow-2xl
cards.interactive: group relative overflow-hidden border border-white/10 bg-zinc-900/50 hover:bg-zinc-900/80 transition-all duration-500

inputs.default: bg-zinc-900/50 border-white/10 focus:border-primary focus:ring-1 focus:ring-primary rounded-md h-12 px-4 text-foreground placeholder:text-muted-foreground

universal_guidelines: Dark Mode Default: The app should feel like a hacker's terminal met a luxury car dashboard.
No Gradients on Text: Keep text crisp white or light grey. Use gradients on borders or backgrounds only.
Data-TestID: All interactive elements must have data-testid attributes.
Spacing: Use generous padding (p-8+) inside containers to avoid cramped text.
Borders: Use 1px borders with low opacity (border-white/10) to define structure without clutter.
Shadows: Use colored shadows (shadow-indigo-500/20) to create a 'glow' effect.
Typography: Headings must be bold and tight (tracking-tighter). Body text must be readable and relaxed.
Credit System: Visualize credits prominently. Use a digital counter style.
instructions_to_main_agent: 1. Install 'lucide-react' and 'framer-motion'. 2. Update 'tailwind.config.js' with the colors provided. 3. Create a 'Layout' component that handles the sidebar/header structure. 4. Build the 'Dashboard' using the 'Control Room Grid'. 5. Use the provided image URLs for the respective sections.
